Squizzy:;

She took a few steps closer to the table.  She made herself calm 
down. "Yeah, it should be." She picked part of the arm from Feline. 
She took it over tothe scanner and charted the DNA sequence in the 
arm. She looked at the scanner screen. "Yes, it's intact. I can clone 
from this. I will need some help, but I can clone this bot."

She went over to Beholder.  She picked up a knife and cut out part of 
the leg. She went over and put the peice into the scanner. "Yes, this 
one can be cloned as well." 

She went over to the large CR and started to transfere the data from 
the scanner and started to generate the clone of Beholder.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::FZ::
> 
> FZ looks from Squizzy to the bots on the table. "Battles are 
brutal," 
> he says, looking over parts.
> 
> "The DNA should be intact fine, but you might also need structural 
> specs. Is there enough of the bodies left for that?"
> 
>
